result.title: Final outcomes of validation trials
result.description: Presents an analysis of all evaluation data/information gathered over the entire project duration. Includes an evidence-based discussion of the processes around novel approaches to citizen involvement in e-government. Also, recommendations for further mainstreaming of WeGovNow solutions beyond the validation sites are presented.

result.title: Marketing plan and list research
result.description: Marketing plan and list research (Month 6-32). META Group will, with the project partners, compile usable lists of prospects for various stages in the project. 1. Dedicated project promotion (Month 1). Right at the launch of the project, a dedicated page will be set up on partner's websites to draw attention of the target audience and promote project news and results. Interviews of experts in the field of operations and of projects representatives will also be featured via product dedicated channels. 2. Advertising campaigns via project web page and partner's network (2 weeks per year). Advertising campaigns will be used to promote the projects activities, research papers or other noticeable achievements. 3. International media planning (ongoing activity): The international media strategy includes advising the project partners on interviews, editorial features and buys in other media outlets. META Group SRL will manage the media- buying budget made available by the project.

result.title: Completion of all 260 modules (background chapters including 20 virtual reality 3D environments)
result.description:
Completion of: - all 260 modules, each consisting of background chapters on Anatomy, Preoperative and Postoperative, which will be uploaded in the INCISION Academy for demonstration. - 20 virtual reality environment, which will be viewable on smartphones & integrated in a INCISION Film.
Chapters are uploaded into the INCISION Academy. Additionally an overview of completed modules will be included in a deliverable report to the EC.
This deliverable is related to Tasks 3.1, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4 and 3.5.

result.title: Full INCISION Academy
result.description:
Full INCISION Academy with the following extra features over the 1.1 version: - Additional features based on stakeholder / user feedback - 300 modules online (from WP2/3)
We will provide a deliverable report to the EC and enable online demonstration.
This deliverable is related to Task 5.4.
